Hi, I'm Pinki Kumari, pursuing M.Tech. In Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Gandhinagar August 2022 - May 2024.
SDE @Texas Instruments , joining by 5th August 2024

I am working under the supervision of [Prof. Anirban Dasgupta](https://sites.google.com/site/anirbandasgupta) on "Automatic Speech Recognition(ASR) using Neural Tangent Kernels(NTKs)".

I did a 2-month Summer Internship at [ThirdAI Corp.](https://www.thirdai.com/), which trains Large Language Models on a single CPU instead of GPUs.
